version_description:
INCREASED TOURNAMENT REWARDS! Each active friend adds to your tournament rewards!
NEW FACEBOOK LOGIN! More control over the information you share.

Summer is here and it's time for an update!

NOTE: You may need to restart your device or update to the latest version of iOS.

DAILY SPIN! Everyone is a winner with our new Daily Rewards Wheel!

IMPROVED SHARING! Sharing your accomplishments on Facebook has never been easier!

NEW LEVELS EVERY WEEK! We have a fantastic line-up of tournaments this summer, so come back every week for new levels, new themes and new opponents!
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!

It’s Halloween on Piggy Island! Compete with your friends in a special three-week Halloween tournament October 12 - November 2. Warning: vicious werepigs are on the prowl!
SPECIAL OFFER ALERT! Get an insane deal on Bird Coins – visit the shop for details!
We also made some minor improvements to gameplay. Hey, what are friends for?
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!
We’re partying night and day for two weeks full of dancing pigs, costumes, feathers and fireworks! Celebrate Carnival with the birds in two themed tournaments starting Thursday, Jan 28!

We’re partying night and day for two weeks full of dancing pigs, costumes, feathers and fireworks! Celebrate Carnival with the birds in two themed tournaments starting Thursday, Jan 28!
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

With The Angry Birds Movie just around the corner (in theaters early May!), we’ve got some extra special stuff planned in Angry Birds Friends. Get hype with us in the Movie Hype Tournament from March 31 - April 6, and stay tuned for some surprises along the way!
– Lights
– Camera
– Action
– Bug Fixes

New Stuff:
– Major performance improvements.
– New level backgrounds.
– Fixed a bug affecting payments.
Upcoming Tournaments:
– Vikings Tournament – Hop in the longboat, and lay siege to Viking pigs! Watch out for sea monsters.
– Knights of the Golden Egg Tournament – As chosen by our fans! Travel back to pigieval times on an epic quest for that precious Golden Egg.

Performance improvements:
— The game and the levels load much faster.
Improvements in the scoring system:
— Fixed a glitch with Matilda that caused higher scores on mobile devices.
— More consistent scores between all platforms.
Other general fixes and improvements

UPCOMING TOURNAMENTS:
– Tiger Day Tournaments (July 28 - Aug 3)
Tigers, tigers, and tigers – oh my! Stop the nasty poachers and save the day!

– Sporty Pigs Tournaments (Aug 11-17):
A week full of your favorite sporting events: slingshotting, tower toppling, pig popping...

UPCOMING TOURNAMENTS

- Wish Upon a Pig (8.9-14.9):
Play a new tournament full of magical lamps. Just be careful what you wish for.

- Fall Tournaments (22.09 - 05.10)
The days are shorter, the leaves are changing color, pigs are popping – fall is here.

Halloween Tournaments (13.10 - 02.11)
The pigs’ shady experiments have caused plant-life to run amok! Who’s gonna save Halloween?

Rewards, rewards, REWARDS! Improvements to the daily prize wheel means everyone wins.
– Better daily rewards all-around in the prize wheel!
– New Jackpot! Hit the Jackpot and win a bundle of power-ups.
– Other minor improvements and general fixes.

Halloween Tournaments (13.10 - 02.11)
The pigs’ shady experiments have caused plant-life to run amok! Who’s gonna save Halloween?

Power-up Updates
– Power Potion gets more powerful! Damage values are boosted slightly and balanced across all birds.
– The Sling Scope now shows the path all the way to your target.
– Wingman now appears with the other power-ups.
League Ratings
– League Ratings now appear in the sidebar. See how many points you receive for each position in the leaderboard.

Halloween Tournaments (13.10 - 02.11)
The pigs’ shady experiments have caused plant-life to run amok! Who’s gonna save Halloween?
Power-up Updates
– Power Potion gets more powerful! Damage values are boosted slightly and balanced across all birds.
– The Sling Scope now shows the path all the way to your target.
League Ratings
– League Ratings now appear in the sidebar. See how many points you receive for each position in the leaderboard.
Fixed balancing issue with Wingman

Halloween Tournaments (13.10 - 02.11)
The pigs’ shady experiments have caused plant-life to run amok! Who’s gonna save Halloween?
Power-up Updates
– Power Potion gets more powerful! Damage values are boosted slightly and balanced across all birds.
– The Sling Scope now shows the path all the way to your target.
League Ratings
– League Ratings now appear in the sidebar. See how many points you receive for each position in the leaderboard.
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

Angry Birds Friends is gearing up for the holiday season with some new upgrades, additions, and improvements!
– Cool and interesting events coming soon!
– Now you can get Wingmen as a part of power-up bundles. Yay!
– Power potion improvements for Chuck.
– Other minor improvements.
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

We've got a bunch of cool new features and fixes!
– Tournament Ratings tweaked. Now it’s easier to progress into higher leagues!
– New gameplay features. Prepare for some enchanting new tournaments!
– Power-up purchase screen improvements.
– Fixed a bug that prevents rewarding players on the re-spin of the Spinner Wheel
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

STAR CUP – Introducing an all new way to compete!
1. Compete one-on-one with other players in rounds of three levels.
2. Win a round to earn rewards and level up your birds.
3. Win multiple rounds in a row for even better rewards!

– NEW Legend Season: Reach the Legend Tier in Star Cup to compete in a two-week-long season with the best of the best.
– Stability improvements for Video Rewards.
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

Monsters are invading Angry Birds Friends! Challenge players from around the globe in the new Halloween tournaments, collect candies, and feed the monsters to earn an all new power-up. It's gonna be sweet!
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

Rescue Santa in a new holiday tournament! Play 5 new tournaments in three weeks of holiday hijinks complete with piles of presents and a whole slew of sweets. Plus, check the shop every day for new special offers!

Rescue Santa in a new holiday tournament! Play 5 new tournaments in three weeks of holiday hijinks complete with piles of presents and a whole slew of sweets. Plus, check the shop every day for new special offers!
Improved the video reward availability in the spinning wheel. Double your rewards now!
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
Now you can see your level league rank in the tournament screen. Never miss a chance to reclaim your spot!
Tired of waiting for tickets in Star Cup? Now you can enter matches using Bird Coins!

League leaderboard now shows your league points. Now its easier to see how close you are to that NEXT PROMOTION.
Don't miss out on the "Offer of the Day". You can now purchase them from the Power-up contextual shop.
Update Now!
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
Boombox is HERE!! A brand new explosive TNT power-up is now available. Go blast those pigs!
Boombox is HERE!! A brand new explosive TNT power-up is now available. Go blast those pigs!

- iPhone X support
- New exciting event (coming soon!)

Sling and smash with a hot new update!

What's new:
-Star number is now displayed in the sidebar for Diamond Star players
-Handy notifications for new items in the shop
-Push notification prompt displayed at the game start
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?

Get ready for some extra jolly holiday events continuing straight through to 2019! Start off with a visit to Santa’s Toy Factory situated in a top secret snow covered location in Lapland, and stay tuned for more to come.
Help the birds light up the night for Diwali in the new Festival of Lights tournaments! Join 3 rounds of lustrous tournaments, and take on 20 extra luminous new levels, November 1-8!
Made some minor improvements. Hey, what are friends for?
It’s up to you to defeat The Beast. Team up with heavy metal mascot Eddie and take part in two weeks of Halloween tournaments featuring all-new levels inspired by metal legends, Iron Maiden!
It’s up to you to defeat The Beast. Team up with heavy metal mascot Eddie and take part in two weeks of Halloween tournaments featuring all-new levels inspired by metal legends, Iron Maiden!
Help the birds light up the night for Diwali in the new Festival of Lights tournaments! Join 3 rounds of lustrous tournaments, and take on 20 extra luminous new levels, November 1-8!

Get ready for some extra jolly holiday events continuing straight through to 2019! Start off with a visit to Santa’s Toy Factory situated in a top secret snow covered location in Lapland, and stay tuned for more to come.
Coming soon: Tournament Frenzy! Play multiple overlapping tournaments in a special limited-time event.

This Halloween, something wicked is brewing on Piggy Island!
Pumpkins, pigs and birds. It's our favourite pig popping season!
Happy Halloween from Angry Birds!

- New original tournaments, new challenging levels, and a new chance to make it to the top of the leaderboard!
- Performance improvements
- Balance tweaking and fine-tuning
